Blood sugar Examination for Gestational Diabetes Mellitus:
Testing for GDM is recommended twice during 
ANC by ANM/CHO by using plasma calibrated 
glucometer. The first testing should be done 
during first antenatal contact as early as possible 
in pregnancy. The second testing should be done 
during 24-28 weeks of pregnancy if the first test 
is negative. There should be at least 4 weeks gap
